name: The Mine
description: You find yourself lost in a mine, the only objective is to find a way out. But something lurks in the shadows, following. Hunting you. Good luck. It's simply a game of cat and mouse. You can run and hide, but your ultimate goal is to find the key and escape the mine. While avoiding the monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Dual-Core Processor @ 1.8 GHz Memory: 1048 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Storage: 90 MB available space
